ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:53:51 [Issue ID 4000-118504] urn:comicvine:4000-118504 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev43 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-19 01:29:35. [Issue ID 118504]
ComicInfo.Summary: Adam Archer is Earth's star-powered champion. But what does his existence mean for the rest of humanity? And how long until the rest of the universe takes notice? Mind- altering aliens! Surreal super-villains! All-out action! The greatest heroic epic of the new age begins here! One issue of GØDLAND and you'll be hooked!
ComicInfo.Title: Cosmic Wheels in Motion
